abilities.name: Carrion Call
abilities.description: A triumphant bellowing blast echoes across the land, beckoning the ghoulish hordes to battle.
abilities.effect: The first friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit to be set up in the following movement phase can immediately move D6". That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

abilities.name: Countless Servants
abilities.description: With a chilling shriek, the Archregent summons some of their most trusted warriors.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Serfs or Knights unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:
• If the target is a Serfs unit, you can return up to 3 slain models to that unit.
• If the target is a Knights unit, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.
